docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v1 is deprecated. Please use v2. If you still need to use v1, you may do so by either passing ‘version=1’ in the Accept Header or using api/v1/ in the URL.

methods.name: index

params.name: per_page
params.description: リクエストあたりのエントリ数

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

methods.name: create
update

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
PUT /api/hostgroups/636252244-Common
{
  "hostgroup": {
    "name": "TestHostgroup"
  }
}
200
{
  "hostgroup": {
    "id": 636252244,
    "name": "TestHostgroup",
    "created_at": "2016-03-10T15:51:22.000Z",
    "updated_at": "2016-03-10T15:51:29.687Z",
    "environment_id": 334344675,
    "operatingsystem_id": 309172073,
    "architecture_id": 501905019,
    "medium_id": 980190962,
    "ptable_id": null,
    "root_pass": "$1$foreman$NW1XVtbk4/XkJqmKNrFWV0",
    "puppet_ca_proxy_id": 182953976,
    "use_image": null,
    "image_file": "",
    "ancestry": null,
    "vm_defaults": null,
    "subnet_id": null,
    "domain_id": 22495316,
    "puppet_proxy_id": 182953976,
    "title": "TestHostgroup",
    "compute_profile_id": 980190962,
    "realm_id": null,
    "grub_pass": "$1$foreman$NW1XVtbk4/XkJqmKNrFWV0",
    "lookup_value_matcher": "hostgroup=TestHostgroup",
    "hosts_count": 0
  }
}

methods.name: destroy

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
DELETE /api/hostgroups/928644286-hostgroup2
200
{
  "hostgroup": {
    "id": 928644286,
